Why JaguarPC?
The bottom line is because we truly care! We have been in this industry since 1998 and know we owe that all to our loyal clients. We put the client first in everything we do from tightly controlled and monitored machines to overall network performance. We have owned our own hardware, networking equipment, and supermicro servers for 13 years now. Our staff is mostly US based with new headquarters in Colorado Springs, and hey we're always hiring! Give us a call 24/7/365, live chat, email or drop by our community forums.


FAQ:
What does your initial install and managed support cover?
A detailed list can be found on our managed services page.
We will :
- provide the initial setup and secure services
- provide upgrades to your OS including security patches
- provide free remote hands for troubleshooting
- provide free hardware replacement
- provide a customized firewall
- just about anything you need done server wide

*How do I get my second month free for two months free total?
Just order from the links above, our system will automatically do the rest.

Do you allow adult content?
YES, we allow legal adult content

Do you allow IRC or Proxy sites?
No, sorry we do not.

How long does it take to setup my VPS?
It can vary from a few minutes to few hours due to the varying levels of verification every order goes through. If you wish to find out about your order status we welcome you to call us at any time.
